Key Match Events: Dawid Malan delivered a sensational 140-run innings adorned with 16 boundaries and five massive sixes.
Joe Root played a pivotal role with a well-constructed 82.
The partnership between Malan and Root amassed 151 runs for the second wicket.
Mahedi Hasan emerged as the standout bowler for Bangladesh with figures of 8-0-71-4.
Shoriful Islam made significant contributions by claiming three crucial wickets.
